about-info: Senior Frontend Engineer with 5+ years of experience in building scalable web applications using React and Vue. Skilled in leading features from design to production, developing internal libraries, improving team processes, and mentoring developers. Interested in frontend architecture, Web3 and backend(Go).
avito-description: Avito is a major Russian online classifieds platform where people buy and sell goods and services (similar to Craigslist or OLX). It hosts listings for real estate, jobs, cars, electronics, and more.
ozon-description: Ozon is one of Russia's largest e-commerce companies—often called the "Amazon of Russia"—selling a wide range of products online and operating its own logistics and delivery network.
citymobil-description: Citymobil was a Russian ride-hailing service (similar to Uber), offering taxi and delivery rides through a mobile app.
brafit-description: Brafit is a company that provides software development services for other businesses.
keep-secret-description: A secure service for one-time secret sharing with client-side encryption.
portfolio-description: A modern, responsive portfolio website. Features include dark mode, internationalization, smooth animations and a minimalistic design.
creator: Roman Vinokhodov
